document.masterDocTitle: Isotomidae (Collembola) of Buryat Republic. II. A revision of the genus Folsomia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Isotomidae (Collembola) of Buryat Republic. II. A revision of the genus Folsomia

paragraph.keyLead: 3 Median sensilla of Th.II–III in posterior row of chaetae. Posterior side of dens with 3 chaetae in basal part.............. 4

4 Manubrium with 2 + 2 chaetae on anterior side.......................................................
F. bisetosa

- Manubrium with more than 2 + 2 chaetae on anterior side ...............................................
F. fimetaria

5 Strong median macrochaetae present on Th.III (
Fig. 5
). Three sensilla of Abd.IV set together (
Fig. 4
)......................................................................................................
F. heterothorax
sp. nov.

- Median macrochaetae on Th.III absent or, if present, much shorter than lateral. Lateral sensilla of Abd.IV set in lateroventral position, apart from two dorsal sensilla (as in
Fig. 16
).............................................
F. sparsosetosa
- Manubrium with more than 1 + 1 chaetae on anterior side...................................................... 15
- Ventral tube with 3 + 3 laterodistal chaetae. Central part of posterior side of manubrium with 2 + 2 chaetae............... 11

9 Microsensilla present on Th.III, general formula of ms 1,1 / 1,1 –0,0....................................
F. amplissima
- Microsensilla absent on Th.III, general formula of ms 1,0/1,0,0............................................... 10
11 With two ocelli on each side of the head. Basal ms present on Ant.III............................................ 12
- With one ocellus on each side of the head or ocelli absent. Basal ms absent on Ant.III.............................. 13

12 Hind corner sensilla in p-row of chaetae on Th.II (as in
Fig. 12
)...............................
F. manolachei
complex

- Hind corner sensilla in front of p-row of chaetae on Th.II.........................................
F. quadrioculata

14 Microsensilla present on Th.III, general formula of ms 1,1 /1,0,0. Dens with 8 anterior chaetae..................
F. rossica

- Microsensilla absent on Th.III, general formula of ms 1,0/1,0,0. Dens with 7 anterior chaetae.............
F. palaearctica
15 Macrochaetae short. Ant.I with 3 sensilla........................................................ gr. sexoculata

- Ventrum of Th.III without chaetae........................................................
F. maximovi
sp. nov.

18 No more than 8 anterior chaetae on dens. With distinct pigmentation on body...........................
F. atropolaris
- More than 8 anterior chaetae on dens. Without distinct pigmentation on body..................................... 19

- Ventral tube with 3 + 3 laterodistal chaetae.........................................................
F. baicalica

21 Ventrum of Th.III with a pair of chaetae..........................................................
F. paoinflata

22 5 ocelli on each side of the head. 2 + 2 anterior chaetae on manubrium..........................
F. pseudodecemoculata
- Without ocelli. Number of anterior chaetae on manubrium varies.............................................. 23

24 Foil chaetae absent at the end of abdomen (
Fig. 29
). Median sensilla in anterior half of tergite of Th.II (as in
Fig. 12
).......................................................................................
F. pseudovtorovi
sp. nov.

25 Manubrium with 1 + 1 chaetae on anterior side, dens with 2 posterior chaetae (
Fig. 33
)................
F. uniparis
sp. nov.

26 Two lateral thickened sensilla on each side of Abd.V (
Fig. 40
)....................................
F. vitimica
sp. nov.

- One lateral thickened sensillum on each side of Abd.V (
Fig. 24
)..................................
F. biparis
sp. nov.
